content.rendered:
We Help Youth Thrive

Learn How

Four Corners Group is restoring hope to youth in crisis by providing pathways to thriving adulthood.

We seek to decrease juvenile recidivism and end the school-to-prison pipeline by providing youth programs across metro Atlanta that focus on education, support, and empowerment to help youth realize their full potential and live successful lives. We serve youth who are:

  • Historically underserved and facing challenges Attending Title I schools
  • Dropped out of school
  • Enrolled in an alternative school
  • Recently released from juvenile detention centers
  • Currently involved in the juvenile court system or juvenile facilities

Through prevention, intervention, and restoration we work to provide pathways to a thriving adulthood. We currently offer year-round youth programs at three campuses in Marietta (Cobb County), Austell (Cobb County), and Atlanta.

Learn about how we are changing the story

Hear a word from our Founder & CEO

Get Involved

The Current Reality

430,000

Juvenile Arrests Yearly

Many youth are arrested for offenses, then trapped in cycles of re-offense, incarceration which prevent them from living up to their full potential. We can help break these cycles!

70%

Recidivism

Juveniles are more likely to reoffend than adults - recidivism rates are 70 to 80%.

Get Involved!

Donate Now

Give to help us provide pathways to a thriving adulthood.

Give today

Pathways To Success Youth Program

A yearlong youth leadership program to help youth with character development, life skills, mental health, job readiness and more. Sign up and get more info by clicking below or texting "Pathways" to 833-392-4053

Student Sign Up

Volunteer

Team Members are integral to our organization's growth and the lasting impact it has on the future of our youth.

Click here to join our team

For more info on any of the above opportunities, click the buttons or text "Info" to 833-392-4053

Click here to follow us and Stay connected

Follow Us

Facebook Instagram Linkedin

Contact Us

470-210-1625 info@fourcornersgroup.net
2451 Cumberland Pkwy SE
Suite 3829
Atlanta, GA 30339

Download our most recent 990s here. Audited financial statements happily passed along upon request.
